tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_components AS SELECT aac.amp_activity_id, c.title AS title, c.amp_component_id AS amp_component_id FROM amp_components c, amp_component_type ct, amp_activity_components aac WHERE c.type = ct.type_id AND aac.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id;
